document_data.caption: A map of Fairheight in northern Callidyrr.
document_data.name: Fairheight
document_data.mainbody: '''Fairheight''' was a county located in the kingdom of [[Callidyrr]] on the island of [[Alaron]] within the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles}}
document_data.Geography: Fairheight was the smallest of Callidyrr's counties. It was located along the far northern border with [[Gnarhelm]]. The vast majority of the county was filled by the [[Fairheight Range]] and the mountain's foothills.
document_data.Notable Locations: Several mining towns, including [[Blackstone]], [[White Rock]], and [[Highrock]], were found in Fairheight.
